about_the_game:
The laser-sharp arcade pacing and design of PD_CGT games presents an insurmountable boss rush run-and-gun! Tear down 30 bosses standing in our way!

STORY

As Earth reaches the precipice of apocalypse, a lone boy with vengeful eyes rushes towards KaiserCorps, the leading authority on weapons technologies and the epicenter of an alien rampage. 

GAMEPLAY

Burst through 9 stages, each loaded with 1-on-1 duels against KaiserCorps' insane experiments and top infantry. Go blazing with 4 different types of guns, then slam a centrifuge of raw energy into your enemies with the Tatsujin Punch and Ignition Dash Explosion.

FEATURES

  • 30 bosses - from giant and kaiju-esque, to soldiers with a score to settle

  • Shmup/Bullet Hell design philosophy meets action platformer!

  • Stylish artstyle and multi-sprite animation

  • Strafe-based shooting controls let you evade while keeping your aim on the target

  • Strike enemy weakpoints for maximum damage

  • Rich worldbuilding and stylish character designs

  • Distinct pre-apocalypse setting: Prevent the incoming dystopia!

  • Original soundtrack composed using YM2151+SN76489, the signature sound hardware of the S MD/GENs consoles
